citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process starting at 10:18 AM
on 13-DEC-2023. The inspector first attempted to make contact at the facility starting at 10:18 AM via phone call and text
message to the licensee however there was no reply. A phone call to a secondary facility contact was attempted at 10:23
AM however there was no reply. A voicemail was left by the inspector for both the licensee and the secondary facility
contact. A phone call was made to another, additional facility contact at 10:26 AM however there was no answer and the
voicemailbox was full so the inspector was unable to leave a message. The inspectors waited at a nearby gas station as
well as at the outer gate of the facility. After waiting 42 minutes, a text message was sent to the licensee at 11:00 AM
notifying them that inspectors were leaving the area.
Additional Inspectors:
Rachel Perez-Baum, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process starting at 10:18 AM 
on 13-DEC-2023. The inspector first attempted to make contact at the facility starting at 10:18 AM via phone call and text 
message to the licensee however there was no reply. A phone call to a secondary facility contact was attempted at 10:23 
AM however there was no reply. A voicemail was left by the inspector for both the licensee and the secondary facility 
contact. A phone call was made to another, additional facility contact at 10:26 AM however there was no answer and the 
voicemailbox was full so the inspector was unable to leave a message. The inspectors waited at a nearby gas station as 
well as at the outer gate of the facility. After waiting 42 minutes, a text message was sent to the licensee at 11:00 AM 
notifying them that inspectors were leaving the area. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Rachel Perez-Baum, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
